section.p: They fear you might tell the authorities about them. Three of them step forward slowly, moving with the slow crab-like crouch of wrestlers. You get ready to fight, but you did not notice the smuggler creeping up behind you. He dashes a large stone against your skull and you fall stunned.
The smugglers demand a ransom of 100 Shards to let you go. Otherwise they intend to truss you up and put you aboard the Uttakin ship that brought their contraband.
